title: New Age Fitness
description: New Age Fitness Members App. New Age Fitness Members App offers a full gym management software solution (B2B) that enhances the fitness experience by placing the focus on the individual and connecting the fitness industry with its members. cleaned_text: New Age Fitness 17+ [ Fit Cloud Technology Limited ](https://apps.apple.com/co/developer/fit-cloud-technology-limited/id1079311129) - - Gratis Capturas de pantalla Descripción New Age Fitness Members App. New Age Fitness Members App offers a gym management software solution (B2B) that enhances the fitness experience by placing the focus on the individual and connecting the fitness industry with its members. The New Age Members App cuts the distance between gym-goers and PT's in order to keep the communication channel open. We bet you it's been a while since you felt so very and As an exerciser, you can create workouts and log training sessions that will automatically notify your trainer. WANT FEEDBACK FROM YOUR PT? You got it! Simply leave a comment for your trainer after you complete a workout. FEEL GOOD ABOUT YOUR FITNESS PROGRESS? Brag about READING? Well, don't you give New Age Fitness a try today! We love hearing from our members. Drop us a message with your feedback at app@membr.com N.B. You need to be a New Age Fitness member to use the app! Novedades Versión 1.65.0 We've added a new membership page contract details if your membership is frozen Other improvements - Main menu styling updates - Improved error screen - Deprecated app version handling Privacidad de la app El desarrollador (Fit Cloud Technology Limited) indicó que, entre las prácticas de privacidad de la app, pueden incluirse el manejo de datos que se describe a continuación. Para obtener más información, consulta la [política de privacidad del desarrollador](http://www.newagefitness.co.uk/privacy-policy/). Datos asociados con tu identidad Los siguientes datos pueden recopilarse y asociarse con tu identidad: - Salud y condición - Ubicación - Contenido de usuario - Datos de uso - Diagnóstico Las prácticas de privacidad pueden variar; por ejemplo, según tu edad o las funciones que uses. [Más información](https://apps.apple.com/story/id1538632801) Información - Vendedor - Fit Cloud Technology Ltd - Tamaño - 52.5 MB - Categoría - [Salud y forma física](https://itunes.apple.com/co/genre/id6013) - Compatibilidad - - iPhone - Requiere iOS 12.4 o posterior. - iPad - Requiere iPadOS 12.4 o posterior. - iPod touch - Requiere iOS 12.4 o posterior. - Idiomas - Inglés - Edad - 17+ Acceso a internet sin restricciones - Copyright - © Fit Cloud Technology Ltd - Precio - Gratis
